Text.Page:
Let's put that overdeveloped sense of helpfulness to good use, . Sestena, a researcher who seeks artifacts called archive tablets, needs some help out in the field.

Consider it penance for being naive.

You're my savior!

The {@Rgn:30009$$Upper Archive} is so extensive that I don't know where to begin.

Apparently, archive tablets lie inside stone boxes scattered all over this temple area.

Collect all the archive tablets you find, and give them to {@LinkCreature:230#1026$$Meterok}. Hopefully he can put them in order.

That's a real treasure trove of slates! Hand them to me carefully—they date back to the ancient empire of the giants, you know.

I have a theory that the giants who wrote these slates are the direct ancestors of the baraka—lovers of knowledge, not of conquest, in other words.

I should reward you for your efforts, of course.
It's about time that Sestena sent me some help.
